ORDER 
At Wilmington this Twenty-eighth day of September in 2022, consistent 
with the Memorandum Opinion issued this date, 
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that: 
1.Defendant BAC Home Loans Servicing, L.P. 's motion to dismiss
GRANTED, and it is DISMISSED as a defendant. (D.I. 8) Amendment is 
futile as to the claims in Counts II, V, VII, VIII, IX and X raised against BAC 
Home Loans Servicing, L.P. 
2.Defendant BAC Home Loans Servicing, L.P. 's request to strike
Plaintiffs' sur-reply is DENIED. (D.I. 14)
